sentences.en: A cover letter should never exceed one page; often a far shorter letter will suffice.
sentences.cn: 附信不应超过一页，通常来说，一封相对非常简短的信就足够了。

sentences.en: A single base might in principle suffice for computation.
sentences.cn: 在原理上用一条基线就能满足计算的要求.

sentences.en: For the gray area in between, no simple formula would suffice.
sentences.cn: 在这两者之间的灰色地区, 任何简单的方案都是不够的.

sentences.en: Generally a brief note or a phone call will suffice.
sentences.cn: 通常写个便条或打个电话就足够了。

sentences.en: Give two instances in point — that will suffice.
sentences.cn: 给两个恰当的例子就够了.

sentences.en: Some bread and soup will suffice me.
sentences.cn: 有面包和汤对我来说就足够了.

sentences.en: Suffice it that without leisure there is no liberty.
sentences.cn: 无闲暇何来自由--说这一句话就够了.

sentences.en: Suffice it to say that the good thing fell down.
Suffice it to say that the gun was his.
sentences.cn: 只要说那枝枪是他的就够了.

sentences.en: suffice it to say that they were not considered suitable for this project.
sentences.cn: 简单地说，他们被认为不适合做这项工程。

sentences.en: Suffice to say, it was more than a couple of years ago!
sentences.cn: 我只想说，那是几年前的事了！

sentences.en: The food didn't suffice for them.
The will of the prince does not suffice to make law.
sentences.cn: 君主的意志不足以制定法律.

sentences.en: This single item will suffice to typify all the rest.
Two bottles of wine will suffice for lunch.
sentences.cn: 午餐有两瓶葡萄酒就够了.

sentences.en: Will ten dollars suffice for the expenses of your journey?

words.tran_cn: 充足,使满意,完成,浸透,成功,击中

phrases.tran_cn: 只要说…就够了，简单地说
